data.lyric:
[ti:You Are The Reason (Duet Version)]
[ar:Calum Scott/Leona Lewis]
[al:You Are The Reason (Duet Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.33]You Are The Reason (你是我的一切) (Duet Version) - Calum Scott (卡鲁姆·斯科特)/Leona Lewis (丽安娜·刘易斯)
[00:01.24]Written by：Calum Scott/Jon Maguire/Corey Sanders
[00:01.49]Producer：Fraser T. Smith
[00:01.67]Calum Scott：
[00:02.97]
[00:03.56]There goes my heart beating
[00:06.59]
[00:07.50]Cause you are the reason
[00:10.06]
[00:11.93]I'm losing my sleep
[00:13.89]
[00:15.88]Please come back now
[00:18.58]
[00:19.17]Leona Lewis：
[00:19.71]
[00:20.29]There goes my mind racing
[00:23.40]
[00:24.22]And you are the reason
[00:26.85]
[00:28.70]That I'm still breathing
[00:31.31]
[00:32.67]I'm hopeless now
[00:34.85]
[00:35.36]Both：
[00:35.82]
[00:36.78]I'd climb every mountain
[00:39.71]
[00:41.00]And swim every ocean
[00:43.89]
[00:45.41]Just to be with you
[00:48.31]
[00:49.24]And fix what I've broken
[00:53.16]
[00:53.81]Oh cause I need you to see
[01:00.58]
[01:01.80]That you are the reason
[01:05.13]
[01:05.89]Leona Lewis：
[01:06.57]
[01:10.39]There goes my hands shaking
[01:13.67]
[01:14.31]And you are the reason
[01:17.54]
[01:18.75]My heart keeps bleeding
[01:21.75]
[01:22.59]I need you now oh
[01:26.82]Both：
[01:27.24]If I could turn back the clock
[01:30.68]
[01:31.19]I'd make sure the light defeated the dark
[01:35.39]I'd spend every hour of every day oh
[01:39.90]Keeping you safe oh
[01:43.06]
[01:43.63]I'd climb every mountain
[01:47.22]
[01:47.89]And swim every ocean
[01:51.27]
[01:52.31]Just to be with you
[01:55.35]
[01:56.28]And fix what I've broken
[02:00.74]Oh cause I need you to see
[02:07.51]
[02:08.77]That you are the reason
[02:10.71]I don't want to fight no more
[02:12.46]I don't want to hide no more
[02:14.19]You are
[02:14.79]I don't want to cry no more come back
[02:17.12]I need you to hold me
[02:18.73]That you are the reason
[02:19.51]A little closer now just a little closer now
[02:22.95]Come a little closer I need you to hold me tonight
[02:27.31]
[02:34.03]I'd climb every mountain
[02:36.78]
[02:38.21]And swim every ocean
[02:41.18]
[02:42.59]Just to be with you
[02:45.09]
[02:46.55]And fix what I've broken
[02:49.34]
[02:51.65]Cause I need you to see
[02:57.47]
[02:59.17]That you are the reason
